project_path.AidusToken: Experiments/contracts/AIDUS Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/AidusToken

findings.title: Incorrect versions of Solidity
findings.description: Using an old version of Solidity prevents access to new security checks and it is recommended to avoid complex pragma statements.

findings.title: Ambiguous error messages in Require statements
findings.description: The error messages in require statements are quite ambiguous, making it difficult to detect the reason behind a particular function revert and leading to reduced code readability.
